scripts.cap:build:android: npm run build && npx cap copy && npx cap open android
scripts.cap:build:ios: npm run build && npx cap copy && npx cap open ios
scripts.cap:apk: npm run build && npx cap copy && cd android && gradlew.bat assembleDebug
scripts.build:apk: npm run build && npx cap copy && cd android && gradlew.bat assembleDebug && copy app\build\outputs\apk\debug\app-debug.apk ..\apk-builds\latest.apk
